creator: Arfrever.FTA@GMail.Com
text:
Created attachment 25971
Fix detection of Berkeley DB 5.0

The fix from bug #49179 was insufficient. I'm attaching the patch for APR trunk. Please also backport this patch to APR-Util.

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text: Thanks a lot - merged in r1002975, r1002976.

creator: Arfrever.FTA@GMail.Com
text: You forgot to commit this change in APR trunk and maybe APR-Util 1.4 branch.

creator: Arfrever.FTA@GMail.Com
text: Rainer Jung has fixed it in r1003784, r1003785 and r1003787.
